item.title: RNC chair bets on ‘secret weapon’ to defy midterm history, protect GOP majorities
item.description: RNC Chair Joe Gruters says Trump is the GOP's 'secret weapon' to defy history and hold majorities in 2026 midterms despite traditional headwinds.
